p: The third interpretation rejects the significance of the historically developed de facto unequal levels of per capita emissions among the EU 27 in 2020 and, instead, for the period of 2020–2030 relies on an equal-per-capita allocation of the overall EU-27 carbon budget to country budgets43–45 (R3-C-budget interpretation). If so the EU 27 will pursue the 2030 reduction goal without grandfathering.
